summary: Adds 18 extra spells to the Vampire Lord form for convenience all gained through 18 new perks.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=1]I Offer you my Blood, take it and you will walk as a lion among sheep, men will tremble at your approach and you will never fear death again.....
                                                                                                                                                                                                      Lord Harkon 201 4E[/size][/font]

The Vampire Lord is one of the most powerful creature's on Tamriel let alone Nirn, capable of causing mass devastation wherever it goes, however late game the Vampire Lord's spells seem to become less impressive and the more mundane spells of the human form become more deadly thus it has lead many people to believe their humanoid form is more powerful...this mod seeks to remedy that, this mod insures to once again make the Vampire lord the "Greater" form by granting it access to the more powerful spells that Skyrim has to offer that you somehow lost the ability to use every time you take on your Vampire Lord form, face it Lord Harkon himself uses regular spells in his Vampire Lord form so why does the player not get the opportunity to do the same? well not anymore.

The Vampire Lord's Spellbook is a Vampire Lord perk mod that adds 18 new perks to the Vampire Lord form, each perk adds a new spell to the VL form that grants an additional spell to the Vampire Lord's arsenal, each perk requires a certain level in either Destruction or Conjuration to learn.

The spells are as followed.....

Tier 1 Spells
- Flames
- Frostbite
- Sparks
- Conjure Skeever (scales indefinitely to 0.10% the player's level)
- Conjure Boneman
- Conjure Flame Atronach

Tier 2 Spells
- Fireball
- Frostbite
- Sparks
- Conjure Wolf (scales indefinitely to 0.20% the player's level)
- Conjure Mistman
- Conjure Frost Atronach

Tier 3 Spell
- Firestorm
- Blizzard
- Lightning Storm
- Conjure Frostbite Spider (scales indefinitely to 0.30% the player's level)
- Conjure Wrathman
- Conjure Storm Atronach

Load order should look like this
- Vampire Mod (I prefer Vampiric Thirst)
- Royal Bloodline
- The Vampire Lord's spellbook

...And no you do not need to know the spell in human form, all you need is the skill and a spare vampire lord perk point, Enjoy! and don't forget to endorse if you enjoy my work.
